## Loading the data
This project is so interesting and relevant to my life!
```{r, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")

together <- inner_join(contributions, committees)

t2 <- together %>%
  select(transaction_amt, cmte_party_affiliation) %>%
  filter(!is.na(transaction_amt)) %>%
  mutate(transaction_amt = abs(transaction_amt)) %>%
  group_by(cmte_party_affiliation)%>%
  summarise(amnt_sum = sum(transaction_amt))

t2
```
```
ggplot(together, aes(y=transaction_amt, x=state, color=factor(cmte_party_affiliation)))+
  theme(panel.border = element_blank())+
  scale_y_continuous(expand=c(0,0))+
  geom_line()+
  labs(x = "State", y = "Transaction Amount ($)", color="Political Party")
```
```
facet_grid(cmte_party_affiliation~state)
glimpse(house_elections)
glimpse(candidates)
glimpse(committees)
glimpse(contributions)
```
